title: MBMBaM 631: Blastoise is My Dad
description:
We’ve got a full-bodied episode with undertones of adult social fears, aromas of spoon-feeding human shaped Pokémon, and a top note of spoiler-free Hoc-Poc-2 Chat.

Suggested talking points: They DO Eat Kids Though, King of Gods, Mr. Jeremy Mime, Daddy’s High-Up Stinky Shelf, Sailor Moon This Ain’t

Fair Elections Center: https://www.fairelectionscenter.org/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
